title: Medical Practitioners Act 2007 (No. 25 of 2007) (as adapted by the Health and
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Medical Practitioners Act 2007 (Special
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Medical Practitioners Act 2007 (Special 

measures registration having regard to Covid-19) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited medical practitioner act 2007 (special measure registration regard covid-19) order 2021

title: Medical Practitioners Act 2007 (No. 25 of 2007) (as adapted by the Health and
heading: 2. The 31st of December 2021 is specified as the different date for the
text_raw:
2. The 31st of December 2021 is specified as the different date for the 

purposes of section 110(6) of the Medical Practitioners Act 2007. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

24 June, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th June, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [298] 3
text_norm: 2 31st december 2021 specified different date purpose section 110(6) medical practitioner act 2007 given official seal 24 june 2021 stephen donnelly minister health notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 29th june 2021 298 3

title: Medical Practitioners Act 2007 (No. 25 of 2007) (as adapted by the Health and
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order specifies 31 December 2021 as the date on which a Section 110 
registration still in force shall cease to have effect. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [298]
